name: Noteloop Dance - Quest
description:
Noteloop Dance lets you organize and watch your dance videos. It includes a video player designed specifically for dance videos allowing you to slow down your videos, loop sections, mirror them and more.

Noteloop Dance for Meta Quest is currently only available here on itch.io. You will need to download the APK and then sideload it using SideQuest. We hope to have it up on App Lab sometime in the future.

For the latest release news, follow @NoteloopDance.

For development news, follow @saji8k.

Noteloop Dance is also available on iOS and Windows.
